author: Slidebean
description:
Adam Mosseri posted a video insisting Instagram isn’t eavesdropping on your conversations; even though we’ve all seen the “battery charger ad” effect. The official line? Their AI is just that good at predicting you. Which is somehow even scarier.

👉 Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up, now streaming on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Instagram Swears It’s Not Listening

author: Slidebean
description:
OpenAI’s Sora 2 just dropped, and the first thing people did was make creepy deepfakes of Sam Altman. He gave permission for his image, and users instantly turned it against him. Taste of his own AI medicine?

👉 Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Sora 2 Users Troll Sam Altman
